original_title: ドラえもんといっしょ:ドラミちゃんと できるかな
overview: In accordance with the fun song and dance of Doraemon, to support the healthy growth of young children of the mind, body, intelligence, Shogakukan children magazine has produced this educational DVD series. In this work, go with the power to communicate while having fun dancing to the songs and rhythm.
title: Doraemon let's go: You can do with Dorami-chan
